generic.Message: Failed to send message to SNS Topic {} with error {}
generic.Description: There was some issue while sending message to SNS topic.

generic.Title: Throttling exception received from the boto3 client

generic.Description: Throttling exception received from the boto3 API

generic.Title: Service unvailable exception received from the boto3 client
generic.Message: ServiceUnavailableException with message: {}
generic.Description: Service unvailable exception received from the boto3 API

generic.Title: Results not available for downloading
generic.Message: No {} results available for download. Please try again after some time.
generic.Description: The result being downloaded is not available yet, please wait before trying again.

generic.Title: Cannot provide access to more than 25 resources of same kind at once
generic.Message: Cannot provide access to more than 25 {} using metadata update, use extra resource access
generic.Description: User should not try to update job with more than 25 resources attached of similar type like Datasets, Parameters, etc..

generic.Title: Failed to provide access of resources
generic.Message: Number of dataset and views exceeds maximum limit of {} found - {}
generic.Description: The api limit doesn't allow to view the resources of the user who owns more than 200 datasets and views.

generic.Title: Failed to create session policies due to characters limit exceeded
generic.Message: Domain name and dataset names are very long which exceeds policy characters maximum limit
generic.Description: The api limit doesn't allow to view the resources as domain name and dataset names have exceeded policy characters limit.

generic.Title: View creation on top of governed dataset is not allowed
generic.Message: View creation on top of governed dataset is not allowed
generic.Description: Creating views on top of governed datasets are not allowed.

generic.Title: Unable to retrieve cluster endpoint info
generic.Message: Error occurred while retrieving cluster endpoint details - {}
generic.Description: There was some issue caused while retrieving the cluster endpoint details.

generic.Title: Failed to provide access of resources
generic.Message: Number of dataset and views count is {}
generic.Description: The api limit doesn't allow to view the resources of the user who owns 0 datasets and views.

generic.Title: User is currently being deleted
generic.Message: User {} is currently being deleted.
generic.Description: User is currently being deleted.

generic.Title: User creation failed
generic.Message: User creation failed for user {}.due to {}
generic.Description: User creation failed.

generic.Title: Username already taken
generic.Message: Username {} already exists in userpool, username should be unique.
generic.Description: User creation failed because username already taken

generic.Title: Email already taken
generic.Message: Email {} already exists in userpool, email should be unique.
generic.Description: User creation failed because email already taken

generic.Title: Feature not applicable for specified resource
generic.Message: {} is/are not supported for {}
generic.Description: Feature is not applicable to specified resource

generic.Title: Cognito authentication is required
generic.Message: Environment not supported for admin user creation. Cognito authentication is required
generic.Description: User creation failed because environment is not using Cognito for authentication

generic.Title: Failed to add tags to given resource
generic.Message: Unable to attach tags to given resource - {}. Please try after sometime.
generic.Description: There was some issue while attaching tags to given resource. Please try again after sometime.

generic.Title: Unable to update metadata
generic.Message: {} table updated successfully for email ids: {} and failed for: {} because the email id's are invalid
generic.Description: There was some issue while updating metadata in dynamoDB table.

generic.Title: Pre-signed url fetch failed

generic.Description: Error while getting presigned URL

generic.Title: Email domain validation failed
generic.Message: Invalid email - {}. Domain should be in {}
generic.Description: Domain of email provided is invalid

generic.Title: View deletion failed

generic.Description: View deletion failed due to dependent views

generic.Title: Parameter retrieval failed
generic.Message: Failed to fetch {} parameter value. Invalid parameter or parameter not found.
generic.Description: Either the parameter being fetched from SSM doesn't exist or invalid parameter name is provided.

generic.Title: Unable to retrieve secret value
generic.Message: Unable to retrieve secret value due to {}.
generic.Description: There was some issue while fetching the secret value.

dynamoDB.Title: Entry creation failed in dynamoDB table
dynamoDB.Message: Failed to create entry in the DynamoDB table, please check for errors
dynamoDB.Description: There was some issue while creating entry in the dynamoDB table.

dynamoDB.Message: Failed to update entry in the dynamoDB table, please check for errors
dynamoDB.Description: There was some issue while updating entry in the dynamoDB table.

dynamoDB.Title: Entry deletion failed in dynamoDB table
dynamoDB.Message: Failed to delete entry in dynamoDB table, please check for errors
dynamoDB.Description: There was some issue while deleting entry in the dynamoDB table.

dynamoDB.Title: Partitions prefix creation failed in table
dynamoDB.Message: Failed to create prefix for partitions of table '{}'.
dynamoDB.Description: There was issue while creating prefix for partitions of table.

dynamoDB.Title: Connection to DynamoDB Failed
dynamoDB.Message: Failed to connect to dynamoDB service, please contact administrator
dynamoDB.Description: Unable to connect to dynamoDB service, check the proxy(network connection from amorphic) or check for AWS outage.

dynamoDB.Description: There was some issue while updating continuous backups to dynamodb dataset table.

dynamoDB.Title: Failed to perform operations on dynamodb table

dynamoDB.Description: There was some issue while performing operations on dynamodb dataset table.

dynamoDB.Title: Column names are invalid
dynamoDB.Message: Invalid column names - {}, allowed pattern is ^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]$.
dynamoDB.Description: The column names provided must satisfy the required conditions.

dynamoDB.Title: Invalid column data type is provided by user
dynamoDB.Message: Column types {} is not part of supported data types of {}
dynamoDB.Description: Invalid column data types provided by user. Please provide a supported column type.

dynamoDB.Title: Invalid number of global indexes are provided
dynamoDB.Message: Invalid input, only one global index can be added/deleted in a request.
dynamoDB.Description: Invalid number of global indexes are provided by user, please check again.

authorization.Title: Missing role_id in event header

authorization.Description: User must provide a valid role_id to complete the request successfully.

authorization.Description: User needs to have valid permissions to perform the desired action.

authorization.Message: User is not authorized to use {} - {}
authorization.Description: User needs to have valid permissions to assume role.

authorization.Description: User needs to have valid permissions to revoke access on resource.

authorization.Title: Insufficient user permissions

authorization.Description: User needs to have valid permissions to perform the desired action.

authorization.Description: User needs be part of group to perform the desired action.

authorization.Title: User doesn't have sufficient permissions to perform operation

authorization.Description: User needs be owner of resource in order to perform the operation.

authorization.Description: User needs be owner of resource in order to perform the operation.

authorization.Title: User doesn't have sufficient permissions to perform operation

authorization.Description: User needs be authorized in order to perform the operation.

authorization.Message: User {} is not authorized to perform this operation
authorization.Description: User needs be authorized in order to perform the operation.

authorization.Title: User doesn't have sufficient permissions to view details
authorization.Message: User {} is not authorized to view resource details
authorization.Description: User needs be authorized in order to view details.

errorMessageFormat.Title: To format custom exceptions
errorMessageFormat.Description: This is the error msg format that will be displayed in UI. This is used for development purposes only.
